name: Agriturismo Montalto

reviews.text: Montalto must be one of the most beautiful places to stay in Tuscany. The food served in the ground floor of the large main house was excellent and the staff is very friendly.
reviews.title: Great place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had three nights at Montalto and we loved it. The views were fantastic as was the general surrounds, the pool, the staff and the food. It was a great base to visit Pisa and Florence from. We ate in the restaurant two nights and really loved it. Staff were very helpful and friendly. Amazingly good value.
reviews.title: A great place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: On a recent anniversary trip to Tuscany, my wife and I found the perfect farmhouse to use as the base for our daily excursions, Agriturismo Montalto! It's centrally located between Florence and Pisa, just south of Luca. These are all must-visit locations on any Tuscan adventure. We even spent some time exploring the mediaeval village of San Miniato.
reviews.title: The Perfect Place from which to Explore Tuscany

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel and restaurant is located in the countryside with beautiful views, very comfortable rooms, and best of all... fantastic food and vino! You MUST experience the truffles! The owners are wonderful people; friendly and so helpful. I give it 5 STARS. We are already planning our return to Montalto next year!
reviews.title: Fantastic location with great food and hospitality

description: Typical Tuscan farmhouse of the 18th century situated midway between Pisa and Florence; its position overlooks the southern Valley of Arno river at 360°.Ten comfortable and bright bedrooms with private bath and shower, furnished in a Tuscan poor style Our kitchen invites to relish good home-made cooking and typical products of the area such as salami, steaks, hand-made pasta, bruschetta and vegetarian dishes match our delicious Extra Virgin Olive Oil and range of wines.
